ygData.subject: ring of the dead
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, somehow you can get a ring of the dead from the lodge of the dead in neriak. apparently this ring has one charge of bind affinity, allowing even
ygData.messageBody:
ok, somehow you can get a ring of the dead from the lodge of the dead in
neriak. apparently this ring has one charge of bind affinity, allowing
even non-spellcasters to bind wherever they want. AND it is
rechargeable! my big question is, which npc in the guild gives this
ring, and what quest do you have to run to get it? by the way, the
female shopkeeper downstairs DOESNT give them, she just recharges. any
info would be helpful :)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
